name: premiumEligibilityCheck
content:
rule premiumEligibilityCheck:
    if applicant.creditScore >= 750 and applicant.annualIncome >= 80000 and applicant.employmentYears >= 5 then premiumApproval
    if applicant.creditScore >= 720 and applicant.annualIncome >= 60000 then approveApplication
    if applicant.creditScore < 700 then rejectApplication
